org.deeplearning4j.util

Class MaskedReductionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.util.MaskedReductionUtil

  • public class MaskedReductionUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a TEMPORARY class for implementing global pooling with masking. Note that it may be removed in a future release, if and when these approaches are formally implemented as native operations in ND4J. Consequently, this should not be considered part of the public API.
